Pre-Game Insights: The Milwaukee Brewers lead 1-0 in a three-game series with the Arizona Diamondbacks.
Arizona is 82-65 overall and 41-32 in home games, with Diamondbacks hitters having a collective.336 on-base percentage, the top percentage in the NL.
Milwaukee has a 43-33 record on the road and an 85-62 record overall, with Brewers hitters batting a collective.248, ranking fifth in the NL.
The teams meet Saturday for the second time this season.
